column1: Hello, I had planned to travel to New York in April, but had to cancel my trip after European citizens were banned from traveling to the USA (I'm Greek).So my question is this: Has the travel ban been lifted? If not, do you know how long it will take before we are allowed to come? Anything else I should know before planning my trip?
Thanks but sadly I couldn't find any specific information on the travel ban on that website. Also they won't answer my calls.Edited: 6:30 am, August 12, 2020
https:/…from-other-countries.htmlNot lifted. I found that on google
